infos.value: Vinera... You would betray Muraga!?
Have you forgotten how much you owe him for raising you?
I owe him naught.
Not after he so cruelly tyrannized my family.
Hmm. So you bided your time and waited for your chance to stab him in the back?
That is not the case.
However...the time I spent with Lord Dario hardened my resolution.
*Cough* *cough*
Lord Dario!
I-I am fine...
But...
Vinera... It is not too late to turn this around.
If you have any compassion for me at all, I beg you to change your mind.
Even Dario is telling you you're making a mistake. Take the poor fool's life.
If you do, I'll overlook your little misadventure here today.
Vinera...
I-I won't do it!
I love you.
Vinera...?
Maybe you'll laugh at the thought. I was sent here for a political wedding, after all.
But when we were together, you told me so many stories. That's why I...
You will not have...any regrets?
If it means I can be with you...then we can die together.
No... I cannot let you die.
...Lord Dario?
I detest fighting. Loathe it, even. Alas...
I will fight in order to protect those whom I love.
Heh heh heh.
Rather bold words coming from the craven prince who hasn't once set foot on the battlefield.
Not to mention that cough you have. I presume you've worse ills than a cold?
True, all of it. I do not have long left to live.
Not long left to live?
Don't make me laugh. You'll die right here and now.
...Care to prove that?
...What?
You would be wise not to take Hourne's bloodline so lightly...
Then give me the best you've got.
Here I go, Vinera. So that we may never be apart!
Lord Dario...
